item.description:
An Intimate Gallery of Spirit Communication  SOLD OUT!

 

We are excited to announce that Tony Stockwell will be doing an intimate Gallery of Spirit Communication at our Church. It is exceptionally rare that Tony who regularly sells out large venues demonstrate at a small church like ours.

 

Tony is known throughout the United Kingdom and Europe for his mediumship. He has been demonstrating mediumship for over two decades, including frequent television work. Tony is a Tutor at the Arthur Findlay College, which is concidered by many to be the center of Spiritualism in the UK. More detailed information about Tony may be found through his website: www.tonystockwell.com.

 

 

Demand for tickets has been strong, so we realize that we must do advanced Booking or risk being overwhelmed the night of the event. Space is LIMITED, so please contact us via email: quincyspiritualists@gmail.com or call Joe 508-818-8550 to get on the Master Ticket List. Tickets cost $40, and will go quickly.

 

Cost: $40

 

Sunday, June 2, 7:00~9:00PM

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: An Evening of Spirit Communication with Tony Stockwell or the United Kingdom
